com.jalios.jcms.db

Interface DBListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlertListener, BasicDBListener, BasicDBListenerStoreListener, CacheDBListener, CacheManager, DBEventLogManager, FileProcessorDBListenerStoreListener, LimitControllerListener, MemberSearchEngineListener, PublicationSearchEngineListener, ReaderTrackerManager, StrongLockManager, VoteManager, WFPublicationListener, WorkspaceDBMemberListener

    public interface DBListener
    A DBListener event gets fired whenever a DBData is created, updated or deleted.
    Version:
    $Revision: 75708 $
    Author:
    Olivier Dedieu
